articles.title: Easier access to opioid medicines could lower opioid-related deaths: Study - ETHealthWorld
articles.description: According to a Rutgers study, increasing access to prescribed opioid medications may reduce opioid overdose mortality in the United States. America's opioid crisis has evolved across several waves, with each increasingly fatal. Wave one, which began in the 19…
